mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no, board_type, create_time, subject, content, user_no) values (null,#{boardType}, now(),#{subject}, #{content}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: select b.board_no, b.board_type, b.create_time, b.subject, b.content, b.user_no, m.name name from board b, user m where b.user_no = m.user_no and b.board_no = #{boardNo}
